name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master
description: A unique Hero that can manipulate the battle from anywhere on the map.

primary.name: Symbiote
primary.description:
Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.
Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

primary.name: Toxic Nest
primary.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds. Stores up to 3 charges

primary.name: Evolve Monstrosity
primary.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

primary.name: Ultimate Evolution
primary.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

primary.name: Locust Strain
primary.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

primary.name: Deep Tunnel
primary.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

secondary.name: Stab
secondary.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 113 damage to the first enemy it contacts.

secondary.name: Carapace
secondary.description: Shields the assisted ally for 150. Lasts for 8 seconds.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
1.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 68 Health per second.

1.name: Envenomed Nests
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

4.name: Ballistospores
4.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 25%.

4.name: Sustained Carapace
4.description: Increases the Shield amount of Symbiote's Carapace by 40% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

7.name: Needlespine
7.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

13.name: Assault Strain
13.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% damage, and explode on death for 102 damage.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% more damage.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its Cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 Health per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 25 seconds.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero. This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.
